thread.title: Why Individuals and Small Businesses Are Being Targeted for Audits
thread.title_full: Why Individuals and Small Businesses Are Being Targeted for Audits

title: Why Individuals and Small Businesses Are Being Targeted for Audits
text:
Why Individuals and Small Businesses Are Being Targeted for Audits -- LA JOLLA, Calif., Sept.   Why Individuals and Small Businesses Are Being Targeted for Audits 08:35 ET from TaxConnections LA JOLLA, Calif. , Sept.   TaxConnections announced today leading tax experts will educate taxpayers and small businesses during the Internet Tax Summit online starting Monday, September 21 st and through Wednesday, September 23 rd 2015. We have set aside Wednesday, September 23 rd 2015 to focus on small business and individual tax matters. Register to attend the Internet Tax Summit online September 21 st -23 rd , 2015 at no cost online: https://www.taxconnections.com/internet_tax_summit . Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150917/267666LOGO During the Internet Tax Summit, you will hear the following tax experts: Clifford Benjamin , President of the United States Tax Association located in Daytona Beach, Florida on "Why Home Based Businesses Are Being Targeted For Audits"; Stuart Sobel of Tax Media Network located in Carmel, Indiana on "How Tax Returns Are Selected By The IRS For Examinations"; and Ronnie Williamson , President of Ace Tax Resolution, Manhattan Beach, California on "Enter The Mind of A Taxpayer Today And You Will Discover They Are Afraid of The IRS. 12M People Are In Trouble With The IRS Each Year. Are You An Individual Or A Small Business Who Has Not Filed Or Cannot Pay? You Have Options, Learn What They Are." "The Internet Tax Summit is our way of providing access to tax expertise online that most people do not have access to everyday. With government intent on extracting more revenue from individuals and small businesses, www.taxconnections.com is a great resource to find and interact with tax experts who want to help you," states Kat Jennings, TaxConnections CEO. If you cannot attend the event, recordings are available for purchase to access this information at any time by clicking the following link: https://www.taxconnections.com/internet_tax_summit/checkout . TaxConnections is where to find leading tax experts and tax resources online. As a tax media site, www.taxconnections.com is a great way to get to know a tax advisor before you hire one. For more information, call 858.999.0053 or email . Media contact: Tracey Glenn 
SOURCE TaxConnections
